author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) will organise melas for reconnecting phone, broadband and post paid mobile connections in the revenue districts of Tiruchi, Karur, Pudukottai, Perambalur and Ariyalur.

The melas will be conducted at the BSNL customer service centres on February 8 and 9 in Tiruchi, Manapparai, Thuraiyur, Lalgudi, Kulithalai and Musiri. In Tiruchi, the customer service centres are located at Cantonment, Main Guard Gate and Tiruverambur.

They will be organised on February 10 and 11 at the customer service centres in Karur, Pallapatti, Perambalur, Ariyalur, Jayamkondam, Pudukottai, Keeranur, Ponnamaravathi and Aranthangi.

Special discounts and facilities will be available to those who get reconnections during the mela.

Immediate reconnections will be provided for all technically feasible connections. In addition to waiver of rental for the intervening period and for the non-working period, if any, the reconnected connections will be eligible for waiver of installation charges and reconnection charges.

Further, reconnected broadband connections will be rent-free for a month and 500 on-net calls will be free for a month for broadband combo plans.

Landline connections under selected plans will get free night calling facility. Those who choose broad band annual plans with rent of Rs. 1,000 and above will get modem free of cost.

More information can be obtained in the number 0431-2400844, a press release here said.
title: Reconnection mela by BSNL
